meanings.definition: A person who trains and hunts with falcons.
meanings.sent1: The falconer taught the falcon to hunt for food.
meanings.sent2: The falconer goes out with the falcon to catch prey.
meanings.sent3: The falconer and the falcon made quite the team on their hunting trips.
meanings.sent4: Watching the falconer work with the falcon was like witnessing a beautiful dance.
meanings.sent5: The falconer's skill in training falcons was truly impressive.

meanings.sent1: As a falconer, he dedicated his life to the art of falconry.
meanings.sent2: The falconer's love for falconry was evident in every aspect of his life.
meanings.sent3: The falconer's friends jokingly called him the 'bird whisperer' due to his passion for falconry.
meanings.sent4: In the world of falconry, the falconer was considered a master of his craft.
meanings.sent5: The falconer's dedication to falconry knew no bounds.
